mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_SEQ ,n.TITLE ,n.IMPORTANT_YN ,n.VIEW_YN ,n.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN ,n.NOTICE_TYPE ,n.FILE_GRP_SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT(n.VIEW_ST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') VIEW_ST_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(n.VIEW_END_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') VIEW_END_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(n.CRE_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') CRE_DT FROM TB_NOTICE n WHERE IFNULL(n.DEL_YN, 'N') ='N' AND n.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND n.IMPORTANT_YN = 'Y' AND (n.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN = 'Y' OR NOW() BETWEEN n.VIEW_ST_DT AND n.VIEW_END_DT) ORDER BY n.CRE_DT DESC

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 no , A.* FROM ( SELECT n.NOTICE_SEQ ,n.TITLE ,n.IMPORTANT_YN ,n.VIEW_YN ,n.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN ,n.NOTICE_TYPE ,n.FILE_GRP_SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT(n.VIEW_ST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') VIEW_ST_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(n.VIEW_END_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') VIEW_END_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(n.CRE_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') CRE_DT FROM TB_NOTICE n WHERE IFNULL(n.DEL_YN, 'N') ='N' AND n.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(n.IMPORTANT_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND (n.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN = 'Y' OR NOW() BETWEEN n.VIEW_ST_DT AND n.VIEW_END_DT) ORDER BY n.CRE_DT DESC ) A, (SELECT @rownum:=0) rn ORDER BY no LIMIT ${startRow}, ${cntPerPage}

SELECT count(*) FROM TB_NOTICE n WHERE IFNULL(n.DEL_YN, 'N') ='N' AND n.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(n.IMPORTANT_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND (n.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN = 'Y' OR NOW() BETWEEN n.VIEW_ST_DT AND n.VIEW_END_DT)

SELECT n.NOTICE_SEQ ,n.TITLE ,n.IMPORTANT_YN ,n.VIEW_YN ,n.CONTENTS ,n.FILE_GRP_SEQ ,n.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN ,DATE_FORMAT(n.VIEW_ST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') VIEW_ST_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(n.VIEW_END_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') VIEW_END_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(n.CRE_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') CRE_DT FROM TB_NOTICE n WHERE n.NOTICE_SEQ=#{seq}

SELECT A.NOTICE_SEQ , A.TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') CRE_DT FROM TB_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_SEQ < #{seq} AND IFNULL(A.DEL_YN, 'N') ='N' AND A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND (A.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN = 'Y' OR NOW() BETWEEN A.VIEW_ST_DT AND A.VIEW_END_DT) ORDER BY A.NOTICE_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.NOTICE_SEQ , A.TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(A.CRE_DT, '%Y.%m.%d') CRE_DT FROM TB_NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_SEQ > #{seq} AND IFNULL(A.DEL_YN, 'N') ='N' AND A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND (A.VIEW_UNLIMIT_YN = 'Y' OR NOW() BETWEEN A.VIEW_ST_DT AND A.VIEW_END_DT) ORDER BY A.NOTICE_SEQ LIMIT 1
